title: FS2004  FSX  Alphasim USS Enterprise v2
description:
as requested


USS Enterprise Scenery

** FS2004 and FSX only **

Features :

- EIGHT locations - English Channel, Norfolk, San Diego, Yankee Station (Vietnam), Sicily, Gulf Of Oman, Hawaii, Jacksonville, PuertoRico, and WashingtonState
- includes full AI-enabled Afcads and dedicated carrier-optimized AI aircraft and AI traffic files
- beta-tested by actual Naval Aviator with Enterprise experience
- highly detailed, landable vessel with authentic lighting (day & night) and realistic wake textures
- working &#039;meatball&#039;
- optional deck position start points (at catapults or on elevator)
- cat shots and wire traps are possible with ABACUS Flight Deck 3 and 4 (or Vietnam Carrier Ops) installed
- carefully optimised for high framerates
- three types of static aircraft on deck (F-14, S-3 and A-6)
- all three deck aircraft types included as AI models
- two alternative static aircraft deck layouts (Launch & Recovery) available
- &#039;deck furntiture&#039; included (mules, crane)
- navaids - VOR, ILS, NDB
- high level of customer support guaranteed with specific section in our forums
- great basis for user expansion - expect AI flight plans, AFCADs etc
